message: Let's start with a fair but generous offer. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate further, but it's better to get something than nothing!
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's be more realistic.  I propose a 60/40 split.  It's a good deal considering the time pressure.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 55/45. This gives us both a decent share and ensures we don't lose too much to inflation.
Time is running out, Alice.  52/48 is my final offer. It's a fair split that gives us both a reasonable amount.
